comments.body: It should also be on Fire Tablet, Chromebook and Nintendo Switch.
This is what the Nether Stronghold would look like:
Try turning up both game and device brightness.
A possible add-on to this is pushing back the fog or disabling fog all together.

Please add Rose Quartz so we can have Pink Armour Trim as I know that it would be a popular choice for many.Rose Quartz forms from Magma in real life so would need to form in deepslate layers in worlds.It would be a lovely addition as building blocks also as could look like a Pink marble and we lack an actual pink stone at present in Minecraft. The Crystals of Rose Quartz to place as you can place Amethyst would be a wonderful decorative addition also..
Why are you fundamentally not satisfied with the zombified piglin?
The Zombified Piglin is literally the zombie pigman but with an ear. Changing that would do literally nothing.

Me and my 2 brothers wanted to play with it, then in 1 second when the second player joined, vibrant visuals turned off. Please mojang. Add the feature that split screen players can have vibrant visuals on.
Absolutely with a ps5 pro it should be no problem
Yes! Please add vibrant visuals to split screen, me and my sister both want to enjoy the amazing textures and lighting!!
Yes Please! Xbox Series S And X should be able to run it!

I believe there must be some unique tribute to this creature. Just a horse with a horn is not interesting, perhaps in addition it is worth giving it more distinctive features, as a separate biological species, perhaps a long tail, unlike a horse.
Quiero tener un unicornio en este juego
Some traditional depictions of unicorns were more goat-like than horse-like. Maybe it could be a special type of goat which is slightly larger and with a single horn?

If the developers are adding endangered animals, then it might be worth adding some extinct ones. For example, elasmotherium - he had hooves, wool and a horn in the middle of his forehead. They existed at the same time as man, and probably served as the prototype of the unicorn. The addition of albinos of this species will be especially interesting.
Pues el inicornio va poder bolar en el cielo
i think this is a amazing idea! i hope they add it to the game.
